long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Effortlessly handle customer queries with our powerful chat assistant extension. Designed for customer support professionals, this tool optimizes your workflow by:

Offering pre-defined template responses accessible with a single click.
Automating personalized greetings that take into account the client's name, the current time, and the length of their message.
Reducing response times while maintaining a professional and tailored approach.
Whether you're managing a high volume of messages or aiming to enhance the quality of customer interactions, this extension is the ultimate productivity boost.

Why install?

Save time with instant access to templates.
Deliver a personal touch effortlessly.
Improve customer satisfaction by responding quickly and effectively.
Take your customer support to the next level—install now!
